name: Idol/TYPE
description:
"adoration"

In Idol/TYPE you and your idol, the lesser-known supporting actress Hirae Erishima write letters to each other. At first they were just fan letters. But now, is there something more?

This title is an original ATP Projects release, published 2005-11-10. The writing, production and direction was done by mikey. The art was done by Kathryn. The title's gameplay and engine was created by mike.pr. Music was composed by evo. Estimated completion time is 30 minutes.

Idol/TYPE is game Nr. 8 of the Original 22.
